text: Class Reunion is a 2019 German improvised comedy film directed by Jan Georg Schütte . The 130 hours of material (6 hours of net shooting time) recorded by a total of 32 cameras – 24 manned and 8 fixed – were viewed, evaluated and condensed into a 90-minute television film, which was first broadcast on ARD Das Erste on March 6, 2019. The ensemble film, with 18 prominent leading actors who had only been given a roughly outlined role profile that they had to fill with life, required a talent for improvisation. 3sat.de, November 23, 2019. Retrieved March 28, 2020. ==References== Category:Comedy movies Category:2019 movies Category:German movies
title: Class reunion (2019)
